# dateAddedToShare

**Instance Property**

The date and time when the participant was added to the share.

## Declaration

```swift
var dateAddedToShare: Date? { get }
```

## Discussion

This timestamp is set when the share is successfully saved to the server.
title: dateAddedToShare
